title: 15 Christian Love Songs for Weddings and...
text:
Every bride wants a perfect wedding day. Natalie Grant's song asks for that perfect moment of pure love to be lived over and over again. 
From the song ... 
Days like these-they don't get any betterLet this be for always and foreverEvery minute is so perfectlyJust the way that it was meant to beDays like these-so graceful that I'm fallingOn my knees and thanking God for all theLittle things that make me wanna sayHow I wish I had a million days like theseï»¿ Read the full Lyrics
